mapper.insert: insert into trainee_health_metrics (trainee_id, is_exercising, exercise_frequency, exercise_duration, exercise_intensity, resting_heart_rate, waist_girth, wh_ratio, resting_blood_pressure, hip_girth, bmi, apss_stage_1_result, is_pregnant, created_at, updated_at, pregnancy_details, medication) values (#{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isExercising,jdbcType=BIT}, #{exerciseFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exerciseDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exerciseIntensity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{restingHeartRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waistGirth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{restingBloodPressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hipGirth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bmi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{apssStage1Result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPregnant,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pregnancyDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{medication,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update trainee_health_metrics set is_exercising = #{isExercising,jdbcType=BIT}, exercise_frequency = #{exerciseFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exercise_duration = #{exerciseDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exercise_intensity = #{exerciseIntensity,jdbcType=CHAR}, resting_heart_rate = #{restingHeartRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, waist_girth = #{waistGirth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wh_ratio = #{whRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, resting_blood_pressure = #{restingBloodPressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hip_girth = #{hipGirth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bmi = #{bmi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, apss_stage_1_result = #{apssStage1Result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_pregnant = #{isPregnant,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pregnancy_details = #{pregnancyDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, medication = #{medication,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where trainee_id = #{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select trainee_id, is_exercising, exercise_frequency, exercise_duration, exercise_intensity, resting_heart_rate, waist_girth, wh_ratio, resting_blood_pressure, hip_girth, bmi, apss_stage_1_result, is_pregnant, created_at, updated_at, pregnancy_details, medication from trainee_health_metrics where trainee_id = #{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select trainee_id, is_exercising, exercise_frequency, exercise_duration, exercise_intensity, resting_heart_rate, waist_girth, wh_ratio, resting_blood_pressure, hip_girth, bmi, apss_stage_1_result, is_pregnant, created_at, updated_at, pregnancy_details, medication from trainee_health_metrics
